EmailTemplate.name: No contact 3rd Attempt
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry looks like I missed you again.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Unfortunately I’ve been unable to reach you after multiple attempts by phone and email. It’s important that you make it through the Enterprise Onboarding Process.
Without professional assistance, fully implementing a software as complex as QuickBooks Enterprise can be a daunting task that can consume weeks and even months of your valuable time! My team is here to ensure a successful transition to QuickBooks.
Your response over the phone or through email would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you for your time and assistance
Chadwick Farrell ~ Account Manager Intuit ~ Simplify the business of life Work Phone: 800-498-7401 ext 1447
This transmittal is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this transmittal is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the transmittal to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited.
